review: I was so excited to get the fire stick and the delivery process was awesome. I have a different streaming device in my living room and wanted to be able to use firestick in my bedroom for  prime music especially. However, I am constantly having internet connection problems...it stops playing, has to refresh..whatever ...it is annoying...will check with my cable company speed and try again..I really want this to work...so until then only 2 stars for the easy setup, no I will give it three for the beautiful landscape scenes it shows while idle....that is a definite plus.......update.....fire stick is now a five star for me... The fix was to unplug both stick and power adapter, which reset the firestick...now it works amazingly well... I love all the apps...there is no buffering for my favorites, the beautiful landscape scenes that show while I use amazon music or when idle is top notch.. My guests are in awe...if hesitant about getting it.. Don't be.. This is better than another brand that I paid double for....I am actually thinking of leaving it in my living room..and getting more as gifts..I like this product that much...enjoy...go for it..you won't be disappointed..
